channel.title: Coding
channel.description: Discuss coding positions, projects, UScript, etc. here.

item.title: Devastation: Coding
item.author: invalid@example.com (MrBond)
item.dc:creator: MrBond
item.content:encoded:
This thread gives a general overview of most of the coding necessary to pull Devastation together. There's a lot of new material, and I don't think I can handle it alone. If someone else wants to try to tackle a project, by all means, go ahead.

Decorations
- No info yet...

Weapons
- Skaarj Battle Blade
- Assault Shotgun
- Cluster Grenade

Creatures
- Insectoid
- Skall

Vehicles

The one I'd like to call the most attention to is vehicles. I myself am...

Devastation: Coding

item.title: Wrong size lod mesh
item.author: invalid@example.com (Ticklemonster)
item.dc:creator: Ticklemonster
item.content:encoded: I've extracted a mesh from a decoration in a map, and wish to use it as a lod mesh in a mod. The problem is the lod mesh is exactly twice the size than it used to be. How can I correct this problem?

item.title: Using this Forum
item.author: invalid@example.com (MrBond)
item.dc:creator: MrBond
item.content:encoded:
Greetings, all! This forum section (Coding) deals with anything relating to both coding (UScript) and Bond Designs.

Again, no real restrictions except common sense and on-topic-ness. Questions are more than welcome!
